message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. It's a fantastic deal, and I know you'll appreciate its value. Let me know what you think!

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand your product's value and appreciate your generosity. However, I can only pay up to $9,500 for the product. I hope this revised offer meets within your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While I value your interest, $9,500 is still a bit low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $9,750 to make this deal work. Let's find a solution that benefits us both!

Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your flexibility. However, based on my budget constraints, I am only able to offer $9,600 for the product. I hope this proposal aligns better with your expectations.
